mapper.sql: CREDIT.ID CREDIT_ID, CREDIT.CREDIT CREDIT_CREDIT, CREDIT.LAST_MODIFY_TIME CREDIT_LASTMODIFYTIME, CREDIT.CREATE_TIME CREDIT_CREATETIME, CREDIT.ENABLED CREDIT_ENABLED, CREDIT.DELETED CREDIT_DELETED
mapper.insert:
insert into CREDIT
ID,
CREDIT,
LAST_MODIFY_TIME,
CREATE_TIME,
ENABLED,
DELETED,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{credit,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{lastModifyTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
#{createTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
#{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update CREDIT
CREDIT = #{record.credit,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{record.lastModifyTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
ENABLED = #{record.enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DELETED = #{record.deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(ID) from CREDIT where DELETED = 0
